alert.note: Alert for Copper River Basin (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 23 at 4:41AM AKST until November 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Copper River Basin. * WHEN...Through 9 AM AKST Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance for ice accumulations will be along the Edgerton Highway and along the Richardson Highway from Tonsina south to Thompson Pass. Trace ice accumulations are also possible along the Tok Cutoff from Chistochina to Slana.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
